website_summaries.verdict: A basic, user-friendly hand vac that offers plenty of features for its attractive price point.
pros: Lightweight, cordless design makes it easy to use throughout your home
Features a brush tool and a crevice tool, as well as a charging wall mount and base
Dustbin is clear so you can see when it’s full
cons: Suction power decreases as the dustbin fills up
Some users find the filter system lacking
dust can sometimes blow out of the vacuum

customer_reviews.title: Why reservoir falls off
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was defective because the dust reservoir fell off when I used it one day and I recalled that as a complaint in these reviews. I my case, however, it turned out that when I had removed the cloth filter from the plastic retainer to knock the dust off, I had put it back wrong, with one flange going over rather than under it's retaining projection. As for its performance, it does what I want. I bought a Dyson stick at the same time and that seems to have a more powerful suction, but I find it's the B&D I grab for quick jobs because it's lighter and less hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Hammock

customer_reviews.title: But it does have good suction. Battery life not tested
customer_reviews.text: Major fault: no convenient way to hang up. Tossing it on the floor doesn't make sense. But it does have good suction. Battery life not tested. I do like the flip-out brush. Black and Decker has about six models very close in design to this. Recommendation: check them all out if you are into details.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Lum

customer_reviews.title: An adequate vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an other black and decker battery powered vacuum that lasted 16 years. This one is great, I love the buttons and the power settings. I don't love that if you turn it upside down while off the rubbish pours right out. I wouldn't buy this again just for that.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: This is the best cordless vacuum out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cordless vacuum out there! It has a standard suction mode (good for most things, and lasts for more than 40 mins when using continuously) and a super strong suction mode (which cleans everything and lasts for a good 20 mins or more). and cleaning filter takes 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: pen name 1

customer_reviews.title: Runs alright but the exhaust vent placement is weird, ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs alright but the exhaust vent placement is weird, if you have to come in at a funky angle the vac will blow what you're trying to clean up away.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Nibbler

customer_reviews.title: Pretty quiet, easy to empty
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum totally SUCKS, but in a good way. I like the two speeds and the attached brush. Easy to empty. Recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Einstein

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very weak suction. Battery took 2 hours plus to charge then went out after 10 mins of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than the previous version.
customer_reviews.text: Two speed operation is good, but you almost always end up using the HIGH setting, which eats the battery pretty quickly. Using it for quick cleanups is fine, just don't think you're going to run it for half an hour cleaning up a large area. But for the intended use, it does a good job. Just wish someone made one with a battery that would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Flyboyron

customer_reviews.title: Good suction, charges fast and holds the charge for ...
customer_reviews.text: Good suction, charges fast and holds the charge for a good amount of time. Rated 4 because the reservoir takes a hard push to stay in place otherwise it pops out while using.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Is this a joke?
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box after several months so too late for return. Charged it, started it ..... and no way to stop it! The off / in button doesn't work... fortunately this piece of crap does not hold a long charge either, so the battery died after 10 minutes. Bad product despite what I thought was a good brand name. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: plexnex

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really liked the vacuum however I have only charged it twice and now the battery is completely dead. I’ve had it less than 3 months and can no longer use it. I’ll be contacting the seller to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Riddle

customer_reviews.title: HATE IT! Product doesn't even turn on!
customer_reviews.text: I have charged the item for 2 days! This item must be defective nothing is working and nothing turns on ..no sound whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great suction/cleanup
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful little hand-vac that does a great job picking up pet hair, dust-bunnies, as well as small debris and dirt. I like the extension wand for less bending and better access into tight spaces. Also the little flip-up brush is great for dusting baseboards, although it does tend to pop off periodically. Very happy with this purchase. Only comment is that we've had this since last year and my husband JUST discovered that the filter can be taken apart for thorough cleaning! (ha, apparently, we're not instruction manual readers)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon F. Kern

customer_reviews.title: Batter died after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I had this same product for 1.5 years and wanted a second one. The first one that I purchased from Target is still running. This one died after 4 months and it's too late to return it. It's really too bad. I love this hand held vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Rudisill

customer_reviews.title: Good but batter life is short.
customer_reviews.text: The first one we bought was very easy to use and had good suction. The downside was that the battery life only lasted less than a year, and then would only last about 2 minutes. We bought another one to see if this one will be the same.
customer_reviews.author: YokT

customer_reviews.title: Good small hand vac.
customer_reviews.text: The battery keeps a charge for days, making it usable when you need it. Also the battery is quick and easy to charge. The compact vac has good suction, not as good when the brush is in use. All in all, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AnneMo

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the reviews before I bought it and none of the reported problems occurred. The power is sufficient and I never experienced any diminishing no matter how long I've used it. The charger is ok and I have screwed it to the wall and have never had it fall off. Cleaning is so simple too.
customer_reviews.author: moodiblues

customer_reviews.title: Merely okay
customer_reviews.text: Not a powerhouse by any means. Power-boost is oddly configured as you will always have to pass through boost position to turn off. Push switch once to start, second time goes to boost & third to shut off. Why not just make it on / off? Boost mode only seems to boost noise level & not much of a change in suction power.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Young

customer_reviews.title: Good little vacuum with quality Li-Ion battery
customer_reviews.text: Good little vacuum that can run over 20 min in low speed mode which I used mostly. Suction is comparable to 16V Ni-Cad Black+Decker I have 8 years back (motor is still good, only battery have died long ago.) What I don't like is charging time is slow. There is no speed selection switch, instead single push button rotate through Low=> High => OFF. So in order to turn off from the Low speed vacuuming, it need go to high speed and then OFF.
customer_reviews.author: RT, CA

customer_reviews.title: Best Handheld Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned quite a few handhelds over the years and this tops them all! After I saw how well built 1st one was, I ordered another one! The suction is very strong and can handle a mess! This is a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: SPP

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: The plastic container (where the dirt collects) doesn’t fit on the machine/doesn’t lock, so it works but doesn’t work. Started doing this about four months of work. It wasn’t dropped or cracked. It’s just cheap.
customer_reviews.author: KC HB

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I buy, the first was for me the second for a Christmas white elephant gift. The person who got it was very happy. I purchased it because the one I have at home is reliable and has had a long battery charge. I keep it charging all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a wall mounted charger instead of the cord
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for an old dustbuster. I thought that it would hang on the wall even though I knew that the charger was a cord. But there was no wall hanger included so I had to modify the old vacuum hanger to get this to hang. There should be a wall hanger included so this doesn't have to sit on a counter or the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Warren J Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: The Black + Decker hand vac has two power levels and even the lower level is excellent at picking up things like cat litter, hair, dust...anything smal from a bare floor when you don't need your regular vacuum. Great suction compared to my previous Dirt Devil hand vac. I keep it plugged in and charging and it's ready for whenever I need it. I recommend emptying out the canister/filter after each use. It does what it's meant to do and does it efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kanner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love this vaccum but it didn't feel as strong as the one I purchased from Target. Also the filter kept popping out. I would suggest to buy it store where you're sure it's brand new
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and good suction and keeps a charge for days of using it like 3x a day
customer_reviews.text: this is the second dustbuster same model I purchased. Had the first one few years and finally the battery would not hold a charge. I use it several times a day to clean up around my 2 bird cages. Don't need to drag out the hose for the central vac. I love this handy appliance
customer_reviews.author: Joan L Petersen

customer_reviews.title: I love this little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this little sweeper. I use it to sweep cat hair off of my couches or pull out the telescoping wand to reach spider webs in the corner of the ceiling. It has a pretty decent battery for a hand held vacuum. I loved mine so much that I bought several for Christmas gifts for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wethington

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Have it since December and maybe used it four times and now won’t charge horrible
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S.

customer_reviews.title: These still take too long to charge for only 15 minutes of runtime
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum itself did a good job and all, but the runtime is short. It only lasts 15 minutes really and it takes a few hours to recharge, at this point a broom is faster and less effort.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Best powerful handheld
customer_reviews.text: Powerful motor, nice size, easy to handle. Only 1/3 the cost of my old Dyson handheld. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: bred1

customer_reviews.title: BATTERY LIFE IS HORRIBLE... 15mins at best after 1 month of average use.
customer_reviews.text: Great product until after 1 month of use... THE BATTERY IS HORRIBLE. I mean this thing lasts 15 mins then dies... I cant believe the decline in the batteries life after just 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Pascucci

customer_reviews.title: See if there's a better option
customer_reviews.text: Crap suction and ends up blowing the dirty away due to location of the motor vent
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Strong little vacuum battery lasts a long time and the suction is great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Strong little vacuum battery lasts a long time and the suction is great quality
customer_reviews.author: Tony Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those little jobs when you don't want to get the big vacuum out.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: best cordless I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is simply better than the cheaper models. The charge lasts longer and more suction than cheaper models. Great vac.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wegner

customer_reviews.title: works as described
customer_reviews.text: preformed as dictated. A great tool for quick small space cleaning. Useful for patio cushions, etc. Great for small duties.
customer_reviews.author: beauty

customer_reviews.title: Suction Power
customer_reviews.text: For a small hand vacuum it has nice suction power to it. Very convenient for a quick cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne Gray

customer_reviews.title: Battery won't charge after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Black & Decker who's battery refused to charge after what I feel is an unacceptably short length of time. I'm done with this brand now unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life
customer_reviews.text: I have always had dust busters that have lasted me at least 5-6 years. The battery on this model has not even lasted 2 years. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No wall Hanging part included. DON"T buy if you want to wall mount.
customer_reviews.text: Reading reviews for this item led me to believe there is a wall mount attachment included. THERE IS NOT !!! Beware
customer_reviews.author: John B. Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: not that good
customer_reviews.text: does not have wall stand to hang vacuum bad suction hard to clean
customer_reviews.author: vacman

customer_reviews.title: Which you will need to use most of the time to get the best suction from the unit
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok for small quick jobs. The charge does not last long when you use the boost power option. Which you will need to use most of the time to get the best suction from the unit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great except for battery life
customer_reviews.text: Nice little dust buster except for the battery life. Luckily it’s used only for fast little jobs.
customer_reviews.author: JJVon

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I owned this one already and bought this for my mom in Black Friday. Works great, great suction. I just walk around my house and suck up stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Cordless power
customer_reviews.text: Nice,Good power,.easy to clean.problem,brush keeps falling off.Light,comes with a smart charger
customer_reviews.author: Njfogey

customer_reviews.title: Junk Vacuume!
customer_reviews.text: The exhaust from the motor blows dust. all over the place, it's a poor design. Would not recommended it at all.piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is AWSOME! I get lots of use out of it. Smartest $40 bucks I’ve spent!
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Moustakas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks switch stuck in on position and unable to use. Tossed in garbage. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rick P

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum had great suction; however, after only five to six usage, the unit will not power on or charge with non-stop blinking of the LED when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: It is good for quick pick ups
customer_reviews.text: This works great in the car the battery could last a bit longer
customer_reviews.author: gloria gregory

customer_reviews.title: I received one that had been returned and was used - whaaat????
customer_reviews.text: Received the vacuum yesterday. The box has been taped many times and when I opened it, it had definitely been used and the return slip was inside it. Hmmm...
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: It was clearly used before I got it. Had ...
customer_reviews.text: It was clearly used before I got it. Had dirt in the dirt cup already. When I turned the box to the other end, I could tell it had been retapped shut. Which would have been fine if I had bought it used, but it was supposed to be new.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Was misled
customer_reviews.text: I did not get a charger with my vacuum neither a crevice tool
customer_reviews.author: marro

customer_reviews.title: A decent handheld cordless vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the vacuum primarily to clean up stray cat litter from the floor. It works relatively well on loop carpet, but not so much on hard floors when the brush attachment is utilized. Even at the powerboost setting it has a difficult time picking up larger pellets. Have yet to use the vacuum in the auto, but plan to revise my review if the performance is less than adequate. Given the chance would purchase another model with a better track record, and could be mounted on a wall.
customer_reviews.author: N. P. Lizaso

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite appliance! Great power....works so well....may order another one so that we'll have one upstairs and one downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a hand-held vacuum that works great and doesn’t lose power right away. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great for small jobs.... mount the stand and it's ready whenever you need it. Plenty of power.
customer_reviews.author: E. Muelller

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: Great hand vacuum, but there is no base that would also work as an wall attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Reynald JP Hiole

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best small hand held vacuum I have used!
customer_reviews.author: Donna miller

customer_reviews.title: So far it is excellent
customer_reviews.text: My 30 year old hand vac finally gave up the ghost. I love my new B+D Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Useful all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and efficient at anytime. We do not have to use our vacuum anymore for minor clean ups.
customer_reviews.author: John C Papageorgiou

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic...the extension nozzle reaches everywhere other models don't...pickups made easy! Great power! Easy to clean out! Recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: judith becker

customer_reviews.title: Try to keep it always charged
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use , battery is adequate and it cleans up really well
customer_reviews.author: Alfredsalamanca

customer_reviews.title: Great until it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: 4 months after warranty expired, it turns on by itself. Freaky!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BRAND NEW ITEM WON'T CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: Brand new product did not charge...... Give me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Bock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my house and car. Fantastic little hand vac
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Battery Life.
customer_reviews.text: The charge retainment on this product is horrible. I bought two seperate Decker models and thought they were defective. I just returned this one back. I suspect the product is stored semi-charged in the warehouse and that degrades battery life over time. That may be why only some customers have issues. However, it does vacuum well.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd D.

customer_reviews.title: We had this hand vac for a few months and ...
customer_reviews.text: We had this hand vac for a few months and it died. Would not charge at all. We threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: It sucks wonderfully and at 2 speeds.
customer_reviews.text: I have found so many uses for this. It's great for cleaning in corners and high places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it! Works great and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: jlh

customer_reviews.title: Great hand vac
customer_reviews.text: Great hand vac, plenty of power and it is wall mountable which was a primary reason I bought it. It is well balanced and gets the job done. Plenty of battery reserve power.
customer_reviews.author: Miki Smith

customer_reviews.title: A House Tool Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this gift! She uses it everyday to pick up dog hair and for all sorts of cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stay away
customer_reviews.text: have had this since 2016. Probably used 20 times or so. Just went to use it; no charging. Dead as a door nail.
customer_reviews.author: dennis e gowen

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced & disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. I keep having issues with mine. Not happy with this product. Used better. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lilbit12

customer_reviews.title: Are there better cordless vacuums
customer_reviews.text: It does its job. Are there better cordless vacuums..yes.. Pros: Suction is okay. Small and compact It has a brush at the tip that can be retracted when needed. Cons Small capacity Suction is okay and this is a big one..whoever designed this decided he wanted to be different and built this with the exhaust at the bottom blowing back and sideways. Most models have the exhaust at the rear and not blowing down..the problem the exhaust literally blows out harder than it sucks in and anything right below it gets blown around..I would definitely looks for something else..I would return this but I have already used it..
customer_reviews.author: sarcino

customer_reviews.title: After 2 to 3 months it will stop taking a charge
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I’ve gotten that after two months stops taking a charge and doesn’t work anymore. When it worked it was great but it’s frustrating that you go to use it and it won’t charge at all. The funny part is I don’t use it that often so it’s not like I’ve been pounding it into the ground or anything I might’ve used it eight or nine times in the few months that I had it.
customer_reviews.author: runeghost

customer_reviews.title: Love Amazon. Would not re-order this
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say that it was defective right out of the box. The dust tray would not lock in the closed position. Returning it was a problem because of the Lithium battery issue. It has now been recycled to the dump. I will say that Amazon was "Johhny on the spot" in working out a satisfactory credit agreement. No fault their at all.Just got a lemon right out of the box. Love Amazon.Would not re-order this item
customer_reviews.author: Dick R

customer_reviews.title: Sucks Adequately
customer_reviews.text: The suction is adequate, but don't expect anything mind blowing. It's perfect for small, dry spills and brief spot cleaning. The battery life leaves a lot to be desired, but again... it's sufficient for multiple short deployments, which is all I wanted this for. This doesn't replace the small hose/brush attachment of your regular vacuum, but the quick deployment and portability are well-worth its expected shortcomings at this price range. This is NOT a vacuum you would thoroughly clean your entire car with, for example. If you're on the fence, I'd say go for it. If you want something amazing, you're going to have to spend more.
customer_reviews.author: Luke G.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Have had it only for a couple months, but it works great. Excellent suction. Light to carry and holds a charge well.
customer_reviews.author: Phillu

customer_reviews.title: Great Handheld Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Really like this vacuum but was disappointed that there wasn't a way or device to hang it on the wall, we bought it because the answers to questions stated there was a wall attachment. I contacted Black & Decker; they tried hard to accommodate and sent me a wall hanging device but it didn't fit. Luckily we found a way to make it work, although not ideal. If you must hang it on a wall this is not the vacuum for you. Other than that the vacuum is working great.
customer_reviews.author: GarySC

customer_reviews.title: No wall mount.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was perplexed to find no wall mount in the box. Every dustbuster we've had before included a wall mount, so I contacted Black and Decker about the problem. Their response informed me that this model is not designed for wall mount. I won't comment on the wisdom of the individual who make that decision, but it leaves me with a problem. I don't yet know how do deal with this because I can no longer return it and the most reasonable solution involves handing it on the laundry room wall next to the power outlet. (Reasonable to me, but apparently not to the geniuses at Black and Decker.)
customer_reviews.author: Duane R.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy a vacuum like this, as all the ones I had tried had such inferior suction. However, I am really pleased with this version. The suction is great and can easily pick up spilled cat food or the stray pieces of lint that inevitably stick to our couch. The vacuum is easy to maintain, too, since the filter is washable. I am very pleased, overall.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS MODEL -
customer_reviews.text: Had older model, CHV1410L,worked for 3 yrs, dirt got in armature ,burned -up, -A B&D bad design. Bought newer #HHVJJ315JMF, has 2 speeds ,12 volts, smaller, lighter. But doesn't come with a charging base. For a few cents more, get a #HHVJ320BMF26, 20 volts, comes with a charging base, I made a mistake-
customer_reviews.author: Byron  Alton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning dryer lint trap and using on car floor. Powerful battery.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought this! 😁
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Having to drag out a big heavy vacuum cleaner is my pet peeve. (Like dragging around a dead pig on a rope.) I have only had my Dustbuster for a couple of weeks and it’s mood changing...I’m a much better human. Quality feels very good....suction is very good....it’s nice looking. Could not be more pleased! 😘
customer_reviews.author: ANKAN1

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for littler Dustbuster
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my brother after having bought a smaller Dustbuster for him and that arrived broken. Amazon, or possibly the seller, refunded my money so I bought this stronger model and my brother really likes it. He mainly wanted it for clean-up of debris after doing small projects around the house such as installing towel racks and smoke detectors as opposed to for larger projects for which he brings out the wet/dry vacuum from his workshop.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Boutelle

customer_reviews.title: battery is not strong
customer_reviews.text: there are a few things not good about this hand vac. there is a spot on the handle that should give an idea when the battery is getting low. This spot does not work. Nothing shows up. there is no base for the vacuum to sit on. the battery does not last longer then a day. It should last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Nida

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last :(
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of my most favorite purchases. So easy to use and did a great job.....until it started working intermitendly about five months after purchase. (I kept checking the connection to make sure it was getting a charge) And, now, a month later, it doesn’t work at all. Guess I need to find out how to return it.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hand vac
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Black & Decker hand vac that quit working. This is exactly the same, except it doesn't charge on the wall holder that the other one had. It charges only with cord plugged into the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cavanagh

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for about a day or so, but so far it works great. The turbo boost mode Is awesome, the extended reach pickup is nice, along with that attachments being fixed to the unit, not much of a chance for getting lost. Easy to handle, initial charge was pretty quick. I realize that the filter should last awhile, but right now I just can't quite find replacement filters, just to have on hand, the only reason I didn't give it five stars. I even went Black and Decker's website to no avail. Any suggestions would greatly be appreciated...
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this handheld vacuum for my husband to clean out the cars with. Item arrived, husband unboxed it and stated “This looks like a fine piece of tool, send it back, I am retired from cleaning Our cars”. Had to return as already have one for the house.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Mae

customer_reviews.title: Best cordless handheld vacuum on the market
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our house and then bought one for our cabin. It is the handiest vacuum we have every purchased. My dad liked our so much, we bought him one for fathers day. Love the extended nosil helps get in hard to reach areas. Cleaning it is so easy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Abby De Hoop

customer_reviews.title: Where is the Cradle?
customer_reviews.text: I give a 5 star review if I would have received the cradle pictured in the promotion. It works well, but the description was misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Baron

customer_reviews.title: No battery life
customer_reviews.text: On high speed the battery doesn't last any time on low speed the suction isn't the greatest. Use it on high speed to clean car, but had to wait for recharge to finish the job. I sent it back will do more research next time.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Way Beyond 1st &  2nd Generations Dust Busters!
customer_reviews.text: Better suction (2 strengths!), longer battery life, easier amd less messy to clean, and better looks to boot.
customer_reviews.author: illumin8r

customer_reviews.title: It totally sucks
customer_reviews.text: Powerful suction, and I like the attached flip-out brush. I’m not sure what the point of the lower suction mode is (or when you would ever it instead of full power).
customer_reviews.author: BAH

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well and stays charged through almost any project. My daughter used it when she was here and loved it. I ordered and sent her one immediately. She was thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: The best mini vac!!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be more happy with this vacuum! It is perfect for cleaning up smaller messes, dust, dog hair, etc. gets dirt and everything out of the smallest spaces! Awesome for cleaning out the car too. Must have for any pet owner!
customer_reviews.author: gr7595

customer_reviews.title: great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this, but lost the charger, you cannot find a charger to go with it. So had to order a new one. Still love it now I have two. Can go wrong with 2
customer_reviews.author: Arizonabugg

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Should have stuck with shark hand vac, brush falls off when you try to use it, extension keeps slipping back in which is so annoying. Suction is just ok, below what I would have expected for this pricey item. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Daphne M Jarrell

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER dustbuster Handheld Vacuum, Cordless, Powder White (HHVJ315JD10)
product_meta.description: Color:Powder WhiteThe black+decker HHVJ315JD10 cordless 10.8V lithium hand vacuum features lithium technology which provides strong suction that allows you to pick-up most everyday household debris. It allows you to choose between 2 speeds to meet your cleaning needs; low Speed is ideal for sensitive applications such as vacuuming curtains and linens, while power boost offers increased suction with a push of a button. The handle is well balanced and fits comfortably in your hand. The washable bowl and filters allow for thorough cleaning between Jobs and the translucent, bagless dirt bowl makes it easy to see dirt and easy to empty. It has a pull-out crevice tool that provides access to hard to reach areas, along with a flip-up brush that allows you to dust and vacuum upholstery. Cyclonic action helps to keep the filter clean and suction strong. Lightweight and portable design makes for convenient cleaning. Includes: Jack plug charger, flip-up brush, extendable crevice tool, Vbf10 washable bag filter, washable plastic Pre-Filter.
feature_bullets: Dustbowl capacity 18.9ounces; Lithium technology provides strong suction
2 speeds to meet your cleaning needs; Low or power boost
Translucent, washable dirt bowl and filters
Pull out Crevice tool and flip up brush
Cyclonic action helps to keep the filter clean and suction strong
